text: The Université Pierre-et-Marie-Curie was a French university created on January 1, 1971. It disappeared on January 1, 2018 in favor of Sorbonne Université following the publication in the Official Journal of the decree creating the new university on April 21, 2017.Décret n° 2017-596 du 21 avril 2017 portant création de l'université Sorbonne Université == Famous former students == * Gérard Férey, a French chemist * Philippe Jamet, French manager and President of universities * Taraneh Javanbakht, an Iranian-Canadian scientist, philosopher, writer, artist, translator and activist * Wendelin Werner, a German-born French mathematician ==References== ==Other websites== * Sorbonne Université, official web site Category:1971 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris
title: Pierre and Marie Curie University
